message: I'm starting with a generous offer, but keep in mind the money is worth less with each round!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This offer benefits us both in the long run.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's end this quickly before the value of the money dwindles further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Let's not drag this out any further and lose even more.
